name: Shadows (FVD Speed Dial) 1/2
additional_info:
In FVD settings, in the appearence tab, check "Hide dials default background" and uncheck "Show clicks and quick menu" and "Show [+] speed dial button" for a better effect. You can also decrese the dials opacity.

Use style 125342 to hide automatically the top bar.

Download FVD Speed Dial here: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/fvd-speed-dial/

Wallpaper can be found here: https://www.wallpaperfusion.com/Image/the-moon-above/2871/
